channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows DLL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows DLL

item.title: CVE-2017-0039|2024-08-05T12:47:57.664Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20dll
item.description: Microsoft Windows Vista SP2 and Server 2008 SP2 mishandle dynamic link library (DLL) loading, which allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka "Library Loading Input Validation Remote Code Execution Vulnerability."
